comments:
Currently our tooling does not support the following way of specifying an enum:
@Inheritance(strategy = InheritanceType.JOINED)

We do support 
@Inheritance(strategy = JOINED) with a static import specified


There is also an exception when you try to use the first way:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Invalid thread access
